alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 8:52AM AKDT until May 18 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT SUNDAY ALONG THE OLD EDGERTON HIGHWAY NEAR THE RICHARDSON HIGHWAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Along the Old Edgerton Highway near the Richardson Highway. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding both directions on the Old Edgerton Highway near the Richardson Highway. Other low-lying areas near Willow Creek and area lakes may also experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 941 AM AKDT, The Alaska Department of Transportation continues to report water on the Old Edgerton Highway near the Richardson Highway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
